data.name: Wormhole Demo
data.short_description: Jump and dash across space as you race against time in this punishing, fast-paced platformer. Be careful where you land, as the path ahead is filled with portals that will send you back. Will you beat the clock and escape the loop?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Pretty much any modern pc will work.
